content.text: Match ends, Swansea City 0, Manchester City 4.
Second Half ends, Swansea City 0, Manchester City 4.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Oleksandr Zinchenko.
Attempt missed. Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Attempt saved. Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ilkay Gündogan.
Attempt missed. Ki Sung-yueng (Swansea City) header from the left side of the six yard box misses to the right.
Attempt blocked. Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Luciano Narsingh.
Goal!  Swansea City 0, Manchester City 4. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Yaya Touré.
